name: @luban-hooks/use-request
description: React Hooks for fetching data, based on axios
author: front-end-captain <18810940932@163.com>

scripts.pre:release: yarn run clean && yarn run format && yarn run eslint
scripts.build: yarn run build:es && yarn run build:cjs
scripts.build:es: rimraf es && cross-env NODE_ENV=production tsc --module es2015 --target ES5 --outDir es
scripts.build:cjs: rimraf lib && cross-env NODE_ENV=production tsc --module commonjs --target ES5 --outDir lib
